name: Rawe
description:
Pirates and vikings clash together on the raging sea in a jetski-ish mayhem...

Rawe (an abbreviation of Race Wave) is a racing game, heavily inspired by the classic party-racing formula from the late 90's. The goal is simple - reach the finish line before your opponents by using pickups such as torpedoes and rotten fish and staying clear of the exploding barrels and cannons that try to blast you into oblivion. Additionally you need to master the waves of the ocean, both above and beyond the surface.

The game features:
  • Local multiplayer - Play with your friends
  • Character selection menu - Make it personal
  • Multiple levels - From pirate coves to viking fjords
  • Dual power ups - Use what is suited for the occasion
  • All expected features are included - everything from race positioning to minimap
Team Designers:
  • Sushant Bhonde
  • Domhnall Henderson
  • Emil Leijon
Programmers:
  • Alice Tarkanmäki Bohman
  • Kai Wang
  • Henrik Sedvall
